UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: LyeTxI-b, a Synthetic Peptide Derived From Lycosa erythrognatha Spider Venom, Shows Potent Antibiotic Activity in Vitro and in Vivo.
Literature.Author: Reis PVM, Boff D, Verly RM, Melo-Braga MN, Cortés ME, Santos DM, Pimenta AMC, Amaral FA, Resende JM, de Lima ME

Literature.Title: The synthetic peptide LyeTxI-b derived from Lycosa erythrognatha spider venom is cytotoxic to U-87 MG glioblastoma cells
Literature.Author: Abdel-Salam MAL, Carvalho-Tavares J, Gomes KS, Teixeira-Carvalho A, Kitten GT, Nyffeler J, Dias FF, Dos Reis PVM, Pimenta AMC, Leist M, de Lima ME, de Souza-Fagundes EM

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:46.83% Hemolysis=46.8 µM,Human PBMC:IC50=4.16 ± 1.94 µM,Vero cells:IC50=>100 µM,Human fibroblasts GM-637:IC50=>100 µM,Human erythrocytes:30-35% Hemolysis =100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=0.71µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=0.71µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=2.85µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=2.85µM),Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans ATCC 29522(MIC=11.4µM),Aggregatibacter actinomycetemcomitans ATCC 29522(MBC=11.4µM),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MIC=5.7µM),Streptococcus sanguinis ATCC 10556(MBC=5.7µM),Human glioblastoma U87-MG(IC50=29.20 ± 7.96µM),Human neuroblastoma SH-SY5Y(IC50=93.80 ± 2.17µM),Human astrocytoma U373-MG(IC50=20.94 ± 5.18µM)
